mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_num AS doc_num, m.mem_name, m.mem_photo AS image FROM member m JOIN doctor_detail dd ON m.mem_num = dd.doc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN holiday h ON m.mem_num = h.doc_num AND h.holi_date = #{date} AND h.holi_time = #{time} WHERE dd.hos_num = #{hos_num} AND ( (h.holi_status = 2) OR ( h.doc_num IS NULL AND dd.doc_off IS NOT NULL AND dd.doc_off NOT LIKE '%' || #{dayOfWeek} || '%' ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation( res_num, mem_num, doc_num, res_status, res_type, res_date, res_time, res_content) VALUES ( reservation_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{doc_num}, 0, #{res_type}, #{res_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{res_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{res_content, jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.*, m.mem_name AS doc_name, h.hos_num, h.hos_name AS hos_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.res_date DESC, r.res_time DESC) AS anum FROM reservation r JOIN member m ON r.doc_num = m.mem_num JOIN doctor_detail dd ON r.doc_num = dd.doc_num JOIN hospital h ON dd.hos_num = h.hos_num WHERE r.mem_num = #{mem_num} )
WHERE anum >= #{start} AND anum <= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation r JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num WHERE r.doc_num = #{doc_num}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.*, m.mem_name AS patient_name, h.hos_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.res_date DESC, r.res_time DESC) AS rnum FROM reservation r JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num JOIN doctor_detail d ON r.doc_num = d.doc_num JOIN hospital h ON d.hos_num = h.hos_num WHERE r.doc_num = #{doc_num} )
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
